content.text: If you have IndustrialCraft², you can use Biomass or Biofuel to produce EU for use in IndustrialCraft² machines.
Its energy production depends on the fuel used, it'll produce far more energy with Biofuel than with Biomass.
You can connect an IndustrialCraft² machine or storage unit directly to the Bio Generator, or use any cable that supports at least Low Voltage (LV), such as Copper Cable.
Ultra-Low-Current Cable (also known as Tin Cable) will not work!
